topic.title: Suggestion - ZeroMenu Unified
topic.body:
Hello dev and the others!
I found that the menu of zeronet can be improved, especially I found by my use that the section "Site connected" is not very useful in itself, it would be more practical to be able to create favorite sections according to Our needs.

This is how I came up with an idea, instead of reserving the menu to zerohello, why not unified the menu so that it is available directly from all the zeronet network site (and why not via a plugin browser, To have this unified menu on the website "internet")
Let's call this menu: ZeroMenu

I develop the following ideas:

- An address bar or zero protocol: // would be native in ZeroMenu
- A separate section for connected sites
- To be able to put a favorite site directly on the site concerned via ZeroMenu
- A favorite section (entry point)
- Integrated site information (traditionally the slipped menu in the top right)
- Zerohello becomes the home page of the network, with information of the dev, different notification (zerotalk, zerome ...)
- A notification button directly in ZeroMenu
- ZeroMenu is hidden by default, only a button labeled 0 at the top left is permanently visible

I join concept art, and I invite you to enrich this idea to make it a useful feature.

topic.title: Suggestion - ZeroSite democratically managed
topic.body:
Hello ! 
I share with you an idea that I had for the management of the zeronet network sites.

Currently the sites are shared by an infinity of users but there is only one manager, one owner, this management is practical and does not have to be questioned but I will develop a complementary idea:

"A site managed democratically by all users, in this type of site there is no owner because all users own the site, but any modification would require a proposal subject to a vote whose voting rules, majority , Unanimity, other could be defined by all the users by vote also."

Such a site would have the following characteristics:
-No owner (but by voting the site can be reconfigured to be entrusted to an owner)
-Any modification goes through a change request (a preview is available to all voters, each change of code is detected at the request and needs to be explained)
-Votes may have a duration (defined collectively)
- In case of spam, a blacklist is available prohibiting all modification request (by vote)

I invite you to share your ideas to make this idea realistic and useful.
